name: Arrow Is The Way
description:
A silly game about running endlesly inside a dungeon-like scenario.

The game consists of endlessly running through a dungeon where you only have a few seconds to identify the direction the arrow points and choose the correct direction for the next room to be created. How far can you get?

You can choose between 14 skins (to be honest 4 or 5, with some variations), FOR NOW, and run till you die!

More is coming, new skins, new floor and wall customization and some props to put unto your characters :D
